00038 typedef CharStrHashMap<int> CountMap;
00039 
00040 struct GcWorker {
00041   GcWorker(TablePtr &metadata, Filesystem *fs, int interval,
00042            bool dryrun = false) : m_metadata(metadata),
00043            m_fs(fs), m_interval(interval), m_dryrun(dryrun) {}
00044 
00045   TablePtr     &m_metadata;
00046   Filesystem   *m_fs;
00047   int           m_interval;
00048   bool          m_dryrun;
00049 
00050   void
00051   scan_metadata(CountMap &files_map) {
00052     TableScannerPtr scanner;
00053     ScanSpec scan_spec;
00054 
00055     scan_spec.columns.clear();
00056     scan_spec.columns.push_back("Files");
00057     scan_spec.start_row = "";
00058     scan_spec.start_row_inclusive = false;
00059     scan_spec.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00060     scan_spec.end_row_inclusive = false;
00061 
00062     scanner = m_metadata->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00063 
00064     TableMutatorPtr mutator = m_metadata->create_mutator();
00065 
00066     Cell cell;
00067     string last_row;
00068     string last_cq;
00069     uint64_t last_time = 0;
00070     bool found_valid_files = true;
00071 
00072     HT_DEBUG("MasterGc: scanning metadata...");
00073 
00074     while (scanner->next(cell)) {
00075       if (strcmp("Files", cell.column_family)) {
00076         HT_ERRORF("Unexpected column family '%s', while scanning METADATA", 
00077                   cell.column_family);
00078         continue;
00079       }
00080       if (last_row != cell.row_key) {
00081         // new row
00082         if (!found_valid_files)
00083           delete_row(last_row, mutator);
00084 
00085         last_row = cell.row_key;
00086         last_time = cell.timestamp;
00087         found_valid_files = *cell.value != '!';
00088 
00089         if (found_valid_files)
00090           insert_files(files_map, (char *)cell.value, cell.value_len, 1);
00091       }
00092       else if (last_cq != cell.column_qualifier) {
00093         // new access group
00094         last_cq = cell.column_qualifier;
00095         last_time = cell.timestamp;
00096         int is_valid_files = *cell.value != '!';
00097         found_valid_files |= is_valid_files;
00098 
00099         if (is_valid_files)
00100           insert_files(files_map, (char *)cell.value, cell.value_len, 1);
00101       }
00102       else {
00103         if (cell.timestamp > last_time) {
00104           HT_ERROR("Unexpected timestamp order while scanning METADATA");
00105           continue;
00106         }
00107         if (*cell.value != '!') {
00108           insert_files(files_map, (char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00109           delete_cell(cell, mutator);
00110         }
00111       }
00112     }
00113     // for last table
00114     if (!found_valid_files)
00115       delete_row(last_row, mutator);
00116 
00117     mutator->flush();
00118   }
00119 
00120   void
00121   delete_row(const string &row, TableMutatorPtr &mutator) {
00122     if (row.empty())
00123       return;
00124 
00125     KeySpec key(row);
00126 
00127     HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: Deleting row %s", (char *)key.row);
00128 
00129     if (!m_dryrun)
00130       mutator->set_delete(0, key);
00131   }
00132 
00133   void
00134   delete_cell(const Cell &cell, TableMutatorPtr &mutator) {
00135     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"MasterGc: Deleting cell: ("<< cell.row_key <<", "
00136                  << cell.column_family <<", "<< cell.column_qualifier <<", "
00137                  << cell.timestamp <<')'<< HT_DEBUG_END;
00138 
00139     KeySpec key(cell.row_key, cell.column_family, cell.column_qualifier);
00140 
00141     if (!m_dryrun)
00142       mutator->set_delete(cell.timestamp, key);
00143   }
00144 
00145   void
00146   insert_files(CountMap &map, const char *buf, size_t len, int c = 0) {
00147     const char *p = buf, *pn = p, *endp = p + len - 1;
00148 
00149     while (p < endp) {
00150       while (p < endp && (*p != ';' ||  p[1] != '\n'))
00151         ++p;
00152 
00153       if (p == endp)
00154         break;
00155 
00156       string name(pn, p - pn);
00157       p += 2;
00158       insert_file(map, name.c_str(), c);
00159       pn = p;
00160     }
00161   }
00162 
00163   void
00164   insert_file(CountMap &map, const char *fname, int c) {
00165     if (*fname == '#') 
00166       ++fname;
00167 
00168     CountMap::InsRet ret = map.insert(fname, c);
00169 
00170     if (!ret.second)
00171       (*ret.first).second += c;
00172   }
00173 
00179   void
00180   reap(CountMap &files_map) {
00181     size_t nf = 0, nf_done = 0, nd = 0, nd_done = 0;
00182     CountMap dirs_map; // reap empty range directories as well
00183 
00184     foreach (const CountMap::value_type &v, files_map) {
00185       if (!v.second) {
00186         HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: removing file %s", v.first);
00187 
00188         if (!m_dryrun) {
00189           try {
00190             m_fs->remove(v.first);
00191             ++nf_done;
00192           }
00193           catch (Exception &e) {
00194             HT_ERRORF("%s", e.what());
00195           }
00196         }
00197         ++nf;
00198       }
00199       char *p = strrchr(v.first, '/');
00200 
00201       if (p) {
00202         string dir_name(v.first, p - v.first);
00203         insert_file(dirs_map, dir_name.c_str(), v.second);
00204       }
00205     }
00206     foreach (const CountMap::value_type &v, dirs_map) {
00207       if (!v.second) {
00208         HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: removing directory %s", v.first);
00209 
00210         if (!m_dryrun) {
00211           try {
00212             m_fs->rmdir(v.first);
00213             ++nd_done;
00214           }
00215           catch (Exception &e) {
00216             HT_ERRORF("%s", e.what());
00217           }
00218         }
00219         ++nd;
00220       }
00221     }
00222 
00223     HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: removed %lu/%lu files; %lu/%lu directories",
00224               (Lu)nf_done, (Lu)nf, (Lu)nd_done, (Lu)nd);
00225   }
00226 
00227   void
00228   gc() {
00229     try {
00230       CountMap files_map;
00231       scan_metadata(files_map);
00232       // TODO: scan_directories(files_map); // fsckish, slower
00233       reap(files_map);
00234     }
00235     catch (Exception &e) {
00236       HT_ERRORF("Error: caught exception while gc'ing: %s", e.what());
00237     }
00238   }
00239 
00240   void
00241   operator()() {
00242     do {
00243       int remain = sleep(m_interval);
00244 
00245       if (remain)
00246         break; // interrupted       
00247 
00248       if (m_metadata) gc();
00249       else HT_INFOF("MasterGc: METADATA not ready, will try again in "
00250                     "%d seconds", m_interval);
00251 
00252     } while (true);
00253   }
00254 };
00255 
00256 } // local namespace

00258 namespace Hypertable {
00259 
00260 void
00261 master_gc_start(PropertiesPtr props, ThreadGroup &threads,
00262                 TablePtr &metadata, Filesystem *fs) {
00263   int interval = props->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Gc.Interval", 300);
00264 
00265   threads.create_thread(GcWorker(metadata, fs, interval));
00266 
00267   HT_INFOF("Started table file garbage collection thread with interval: "
00268            "%d seconds", interval);
00269 }
00270 
00271 void
00272 master_gc_once(TablePtr &metadata, Filesystem *fs, bool dryrun) {
00273   GcWorker worker(metadata, fs, 0, dryrun);
00274   worker.gc();
00275 }

00277 } // namespace Hypertable
